compiler.name: C#
compiler.comment: we need this compiler, not the Microsoft.Dnx.Compilation.DesignTime
compiler.commentc: values are taken from Microsoft.Dnx.Runtime.ProjectReader.cs code

compilationOptions.comment: both platform key and debugSymbols seems to be not documented, found at https://github.com/aspnet/dnx/blob/e874201acc19854caff9236b420b2864152659c0/test/Microsoft.Dnx.Compilation.CSharp.Tests/ProjectExtensionsFacts.cs

BenchmarkDotNet.comment: for development our auto-generated dll should reference project of BenchmarkDotNet, not the existing nuget package.
BenchmarkDotNet.commentc: for production it should point to package, not project. todo!

$EXECUTINGASSEMBLY.importantComment: you must not set the target, otherwise dnu restore will fail!!!
